Body: Possible Duplicate:  When will my phone get the Android 2.3 update (Gingerbread)?  How do I root my device?I have a Droid 2 with Verizon and the Android version is 2.2 (froyo).I am looking to update to 2.3 (gingerbread) but when I go to the check for updates section it says it's up to date. How can I get 2.3? I have never rooted before but if that's what I have to do to get it then I will. Any resources that could point me in the right direction would be much appreciated.
Title: How do I get Android 2.3 on my Verizon Droid 2?

history.Text: I have a Droid 2 with Verizon and the Android version is 2.2 (froyo).I am looking to update to 2.3 (gingerbread) but when I go to the check for updates section it says it's up to date. How can I get 2.3? I have never rooted before but if that's what I have to do to get it then I will. Any resources that could point me in the right direction would be much appreciated.
How do I get Android 2.3 on my Verizon Droid 2?
